Description: 
--------------- 

Utilizing the unique powers of the Nintendo Wii system, Retro Studios once again takes us to the beyond with bounty hunter Samus Aran. 

The base of the Galactic Federation of Sector Zero is under attack by space pirates. Samus must boot up the generator to restore the defense systems. But at the end of their path, someone awful is waiting for her. The war initiated by Dark Samus and the Space Pirates skins across many planets as they attempt to corrupt each with Phazon seeds. Players use the Wii Remote and Nunchuk to explore alien landscapes, hunt for weapons and information, and destroy the seeds. Saving the planets from Corruption is not enough, however. Finally, players must defeat Samus' mortal enemy, Dark Samus. Besides using the Wii Remote and Nunchuk to achieve amazing feats as objective and blasting in midair or at a full run, players also have a number of different weapons at your disposal.
